Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Palanquin
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A covered litter carried on poles on the shoulders of two bearers. A palanquin is not an efficient mode of transportation.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2, Passenger x1

<color=#bb8f04>Human-powered:</color> Drivers will get 50% more tired and hungry while driving this vehicle. Passenger will be much more comfortable.
